this is the story of how da chickenware family was discovered... ok..for some reason, we(few of da cft member) started calling elaine 'mangkuk'.So, one day, Diyana called herself 'pasu'. Then elaine thot like we ( cassie,anushyia,natasha and i) shud hav a nickname oso..so we started thinking and creating da names frm kitchen wares..then suewei, shirlene,shangari and thamarai joined us oso! why its called chickenware is because...cassie wanted to say 'kitchen ware'..then she accidentally said 'chickenware'. So we decided to call it 'chickenware' instead of 'kitchen ware'.So here are the names of the members: * elaine - mangkuk lam *suewei - cawan teh * diyana - pasu di *shirlene - kuali tam * cassie - cerek lee *shangari - spatula shang * anushyia - tin nushyia *thamarai - paip tam sink * natasha - piring noor *dionne - bottol loong i'll update more the next time!!tu0ra!!ta-ta!! --dioNne a.k.a boTtoL lOonG--

hey ppl....cerek lee ere as publisity manager ere speakng....bottol loong was suppose 2 post...but i juz can;t wait 2 tell u ppl ....neways....we got a new member ..YEAY...see how 'kan lek' i have been in recruiting member....(hahaha...SS) well neways....her name is alexandrea lee frm sri permata n is 15 years of age this year....so to al 'kor ko' n 'che che' make sure u dun bully her okays.....newayz...signing off now....n help me 2 think of a name 4 her...kays///!!! thankz(muaks)

haha...kk..firstly,wana say sorry for not posting for quite sum time..hehe...nyways..frm todei onwards i'll try my best to post ler k? so yea...today...in skool...haha...cerek,mangkuk,pasu and i (bottol) was laughing like mad!!! haha..coz we were creating the chickenware handshake!! and its so super FUNnY!! we laugh until can sit down on da floor!! nyways..we came up wit the handshake..but we think dat its not reli suitable for guys...coz its more of a girly thing...haha..if u get wat i mean la!...so we're trying to come up wit sumthing for da guys...kk..just sum description bout da handshake... its between two person la...actualyl can do in a group..but then it'll be a bit different...so now i'll explain between two person la k? okay..so heres how it goes... 1) sap each others hand...like u noe..playing sap sap sap..bombombom? haha... 2) then take ur pointer finger and point at ur butt...(hahahhaahhaha) 3) then using da same hand...stretch it out ..take it away frm ur butt la...haha!! then open up all ur fingers...and move them... 4) while doin that...do da sound effect...'hhhaaaaahhh' i think!...ahahhahahah... mayb u wont get it...but hopefully u did la..hahahahah...if not..then we'll show u..whenever u meet one of the chickenware family...k? so...dats bout wat happend today!!...so whenver we meet any chickenware family...then we'll do da handshake!! k??? hahaha!!... so...till then...tu-ra!!!! take care!!!

haha...kk..we created abit of our chickenware dance today!..its relireli cute...and easy to dance..actually we just came out wit a small part oni ler..but i guess it'll be reli cute and easy to dance...kekeke!!..so yea..dats we progress we had today ler..ohya..todei our president din come to skool...haha..*wonder why* haha..ponteng ler dat girl!! wakaka!! nyways, committee members..u all can post things ere oso u noe...came and ask me for da password if u all dunno...then can post ler..wateva u want!!...k? hehe..!!...dats bout it for today...cyAS! tu-Ra!!
